H0.text: What Greek mythological horse sprang from the blood of Medusa. Arion

H1.text: What Greek mythological horse sprang from the blood of Medusa. Hippocampus

H2.text: What Greek mythological horse sprang from the blood of Medusa. Taraxippus

H3.text: What Greek mythological horse sprang from the blood of Medusa. Pegasi

A4.text: Pegasus was the brother of Chrysaor, both born from Medusa's blood when their mother was decapitated by Perseus.

A5.text: One is that they sprang from the blood issuing from Medusa's neck as Perseus was beheading her
